mapper.insert: insert into detail(detail_id, comic_id, chaptername, path, generalize, updatetime) values (#{detailId},#{comicId},#{chapterName},#{path},#{generalize},#{updateTime})
mapper.select: select detail_id,detail.comic_id, chaptername, detail.path as path, generalize, updatetime, comic.comic_id, comic.root, comicname, author, status, type, location, newupdate, newchaptername, introduction, mark from detail,comic where detail.comic_id=comic.comic_id order by detail_id desc

select detail_id,detail.comic_id, chaptername, detail.path as path, generalize, updatetime, comic.comic_id, comic.root, comicname, author, status, type, location, newupdate, newchaptername, introduction, mark from detail,comic where detail.comic_id=comic.comic_id and detail.comic_id = #{comicId} order by updatetime desc

select detail_id,detail.comic_id, chaptername, detail.path as path, generalize, updatetime, comic.comic_id, comic.root, comicname, author, status, type, location, newupdate, newchaptername, introduction, mark from detail,comic where detail.comic_id=comic.comic_id and detail.comic_id in (select comic.comic_id from comic where type like #{likeType}) order by updatetime DESC

select detail_id,detail.comic_id, chaptername, detail.path as path, generalize, updatetime, comic.comic_id, comic.root, comicname, author, status, type, location, newupdate, newchaptername, introduction, mark from detail,comic where detail.comic_id=comic.comic_id and detail_id = #{detailId}

select detail_id,detail.comic_id, chaptername, detail.path as path, generalize, updatetime, comic.comic_id, comic.root, comicname, author, status, type, location, newupdate, newchaptername, introduction, mark from detail,comic where detail.comic_id=comic.comic_id and detail.comic_id = #{comicId} and chapterName = #{chapterName}
